page.title: 02Clubs (see also recreation)
page.content: BADMINTON Meets each Wednesday in the season in the Memorial Social Centre 12 local members, playing only friendly fixtures. Weekly subscription. BINGO No information available BOWLS (Miniature\outdoors) Meets twice weekly in the Mem Soc Centre (MSC) on Tuesdays and Thursdays. 40 local members. Plays local and county competitions. Annual subs supplemented by weekly games fee. COMMUNITY COUNCIL Meets first Monday every month MSC. 430 local members. Exists to promote and co-ordinate local activities (see EVENTS). Publishes bi- monthly "Wickhambrook Scene". CRICKET CLUB Meets on the village Recreation Ground. Plays friendly matches & invitation cup competitions. 18 playing members. Annual subscription. Holds a winter dinner\ dance presentation (see EVENTS).
